titleStmt.title: A lady's religion In a letter to the Honourable my Lady Howard. By a divine of the Church of England. With a prefatory epistle to the same lady, by a lay-gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Divine of the Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Warren for Richard Baldwin, at the Oxford-Arms in Warwick-lane,

notesStmt.note: The prefatory epistle is signed: Adeisidæmon.
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.
